column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Service was prompt
column3: and the hostess was friendly and polite.  Cleanliness could be a problem though! hahaahaa Not in the restrooms but all over the decorative white pebble stones in the center of the table
column4: where greasy food sauce were splashed onto.  Certainly the tables were wiped off after each use but how often would they clean the pebble rocks? hmmm......
